name: Remember CF7 Entries
author: Softound Solutions

sections.description:
This plugin is used to remember the contactform7 form field entries, so user no need to enter the field values again and again, the entered values will stay in form field after refresh the contact form page.

If you need any additional features, please post in support forum, we will analyse and implement in next version.
we are still implementing this plugin, please rate our plugin and write your valuable comments.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/remember-cf7-entries directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Then, goto your contact form page, try to fill the form fields and press “Submit” button
  4. Refesh the page, you can see the previously filed values stay in field
